channel.title: Which song of mine should I remix?
channel.description:
Something I've been thinking of doing for a while is remixing one of my past songs. I have plenty to choose from, but I don't know which one I should pick. So, what do you guys think? Which song of mine should I remix? [poll type=multiple min=1 max=4 public=true] * Tempest * Into the Ocean * The Fire Inside * Catalyst [/poll]
(This is assuming you've heard these songs, which if you haven't, are right here: https://soundcloud.com/mrandersonauxy )

item.title: Which song of mine should I remix?
item.dc:creator: NotMiles
item.description:
It honestly doesn’t matter, because whichever one you remix will sound awesome!

Read full topic
